verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> bish-nat- year שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' In the seventh לְיֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> le-ye-Hu of Jehu מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach began to reign יְהוֹאָ֔שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash, Jehoash וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach reigned בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, And his mother's צִבְיָ֖ה <S%H6645><s%> tziv-Yah [was] Zibiah מִבְּאֵ֥ר mib-be-'Er שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> Sha-va'. of Beersheba

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did יְהוֹאָ֧שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash And Jehoash הַיָּשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יָמָ֑יו <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mav; all his days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הוֹרָ֔הוּ <S%H3384><s%> ho-Ra-hu, instructed יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' wherein Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen. the priest

רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mot But the high places לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- were not סָ֑רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Sa-ru; were not taken away ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od still הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> me-zab-be-Chim still sacrificed וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> u-me-kat-te-Rim and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1116><s%> bab-ba-Mot. in the high places

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash And Jehoash אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim, to the priests כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> kol All כֶּ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef All the money הַקֳּדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim of the dedicated things אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יוּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> yu-Va that is brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- into the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef [even] the money עוֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> o-Ver, that passeth אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of every one כֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef [the account] the money נַפְשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shot that every man עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H6187><s%> er-Ko; is set at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, [and] all the money אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַֽעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh that cometh עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and לֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> lev- heart אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, into any man's לְהָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi to bring בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

יִקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Chu take לָהֶם֙ la-Hem הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, Let the priests אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [it] to them every man מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et מַכָּר֑וֹ <S%H4378><s%> mak-ka-Ro; of his acquaintance וְהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem, and they יְחַזְּקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> ye-chaz-ze-Ku and let them repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֣דֶק <S%H919><s%> Be-dek the breaches הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, of the house לְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze shall be found שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham any בָּֽדֶק׃ <S%H919><s%> Ba-dek. wheresoever any breach פ Peh

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twentieth וְשָׁלֹ֛שׁ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Losh three שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech of king יְהוֹאָ֑שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash; Jehoash לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not חִזְּק֥וּ <S%H2388><s%> chiz-ze-Ku had not repaired הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> Be-dek the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. of the house

וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech Then king יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <S%H3060><s%> ye-ho-'Ash Jehoash לִיהוֹיָדָ֤ע <S%H3077><s%> li-ho-ya-Da' for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְלַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> ve-lak-Ko-ha-Nim, and the [other] priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why אֵינְכֶ֥ם <S%H369><s%> 'ein-Chem not מְחַזְּקִ֖ים <S%H2388><s%> me-chaz-ze-Kim unto them Why repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֣דֶק <S%H919><s%> Be-dek ye not the breaches הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; of the house וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, henceforth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- no תִּקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> tik-chu- take כֶ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> che-sef no [more] money מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et מַכָּֽרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4378><s%> mak-ka-rei-Chem, of your acquaintance כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לְבֶ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> le-Ve-dek it for the breaches הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house תִּתְּנֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu-hu. but deliver

וַיֵּאֹ֖תוּ <S%H225><s%> vai-ye-'O-tu consented הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim; And the priests לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti no קְחַת־ <S%H3947><s%> ke-chat- to receive כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef [more] money מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of the people וּלְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> u-le-vil-Ti neither חַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> chaz-Zek to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> Be-dek the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. of the house

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took יְהוֹיָדָ֤ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' But Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron chest אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, a וַיִּקֹּ֥ב <S%H5344><s%> vai-yik-Ko and bored חֹ֖ר <S%H2356><s%> chor a hole בְּדַלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H1817><s%> be-dal-To; in the lid וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten of it and set אֹתוֹ֩ <S%H853><s%> o-To אֵ֨צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel it beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֜חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach the altar; בַּיָּמִין bai-ya-min כמִיָּמִ֗ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-ya-Min, left-handed קבְּבֽוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> be-Vo- cometh אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish as one בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְנָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-nu- put שָׁ֤מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim and the priests שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei that kept הַסַּ֔ף <S%H5592><s%> has-Saf, the door אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef therein all the money הַמּוּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> ham-mu-Va [that was] brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּרְאוֹתָ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> kir-'o-Tam, And it was [so] when they saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- there was רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> rav that [there was] much הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef money בָּֽאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> ba-'a-Ron; in the chest וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al came up סֹפֵ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> so-Fer scribe הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech that the king's וְהַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> ve-hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, and the high וַיָּצֻ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6696><s%> vai-ya-Tzu-ru and they put up in bags וַיִּמְנ֔וּ <S%H4487><s%> vai-yim-Nu, and told אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef the money הַנִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-Tza that was found בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְנָתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu And they gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef the money הַֽמְתֻכָּ֔ן <S%H8505><s%> ham-tuk-Kan, being told עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and; יַד yad כיְדֵי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei able קעֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sei of them that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, the work; הַפְּקֻדִים hap-pe-ku-dim כהַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> ham-muf-ka-Dim appoint קבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיּוֹצִיאֻ֜הוּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'U-hu and they laid it out לְחָרָשֵׁ֤י <S%H2796><s%> le-cha-ra-Shei artificer הָעֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz carpenter וְלַבֹּנִ֔ים <S%H1129><s%> ve-lab-bo-Nim, and builders הָעֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> ha-'o-Sim that wrought בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit upon the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְלַגֹּֽדְרִים֙ <S%H1443><s%> ve-lag-go-de-Rim And to masons וּלְחֹצְבֵ֣י <S%H2672><s%> u-le-cho-tze-Vei and hewers הָאֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven, of stone וְלִקְנ֤וֹת <S%H7069><s%> ve-lik-Not and to buy עֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim timber וְאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> ve-'av-Nei stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <S%H4274><s%> mach-Tzev, and hewed לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> le-chaz-Zek to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֣דֶק <S%H919><s%> Be-dek the breaches בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וּלְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> u-le-Chol and for all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that was יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze and for all that was laid out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- out הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit for the house לְחָזְקָֽה׃ <S%H2394><s%> le-cha-ze-Kah. to repair

אַךְ֩ <S%H389><s%> 'aCh also לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo were not יֵעָשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh Howbeit there were not made בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit for the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD סִפּ֥וֹת <S%H5592><s%> sip-Pot bowls כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef of silver מְזַמְּר֤וֹת <S%H4212><s%> me-zam-me-Rot snuffers מִזְרָקוֹת֙ <S%H4219><s%> miz-ra-kOt basons חֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <S%H2689><s%> cha-Tzo-tze-Rot, trumpets כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any כְּלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li any vessels זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold וּכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> u-che-li- or vessels כָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Cha-sef; of silver מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef of the money הַמּוּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> ham-mu-Va [that was] brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD
